## cdk-selectable package

A component development kit used to create a set of selectable components

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [CdkSelectableContainerDirective](./cdk-selectable.cdkselectablecontainerdirective.md) | Add to a element to make it a container component for selectable components that inherits from the [CdkSelectableItemBaseComponent](./cdk-selectable.cdkselectableitembasecomponent.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [CdkSelectableItemBaseComponent](./cdk-selectable.cdkselectableitembasecomponent.md) | A base for a selectable component contained in an [CdkSelectableContainerDirective](./cdk-selectable.cdkselectablecontainerdirective.md) |
|  [CdkSelectableModule](./cdk-selectable.cdkselectablemodule.md) | Responsible for exporting the [CdkSelectableContainerDirective](./cdk-selectable.cdkselectablecontainerdirective.md) |
|  [CdkSelectablePresenter](./cdk-selectable.cdkselectablepresenter.md) | Responsible for providing the view logic shared by the selectable components in the scope. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [IdSelectPair](./cdk-selectable.idselectpair.md) | Represents an id and a selected status for the given id. |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [SelectedMap](./cdk-selectable.selectedmap.md) | Represents a map of ids and associated [IdSelectPair](./cdk-selectable.idselectpair.md) |
